revised_title: Bromination of 2-Carbethoxy\lt;italic\gt;cyclo\lt;/italic\gt;pentanone: A Study of Catalysts and Low Temperatures
tldr: The authors studied the bromination of 2-carbethoxy\lt;italic\gt;cyclo\lt;/italic\gt;pentanone at low temperatures and investigated the effects of different catalysts, such as fluoride ion and acetate ion. They found that the reaction rates and activation energies were influenced by the catalysts and temperature. The results showed a significant isotope effect, indicating that the quantum mechanical tunneling effect played a role in the reaction.
